snippet: KLEINBERG--Norman. Esteemed colleague; brilliant attorney; giving husband, father, and grandfather; game travel companion; discriminating shopper; gifted blackjack player. Most of all, loyal friend. We will never forget the good times. Our hearts go out to Marcia, Lauren, Joanna and their families. The Scherers and the Fuersts 1/3
lead_paragraph: KLEINBERG--Norman. Esteemed colleague; brilliant attorney; giving husband, father, and grandfather; game travel companion; discriminating shopper; gifted blackjack player.
